words.source: H3513 wayyiqtol 3ms Hiphil of כָּבֵד 'to be heavy'; KJV 'hardened', ESV 'hardened', NASB 'hardened'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3820 n.ms construct lev 'heart' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his heart', ESV 'his heart', NASB 'his heart'
H1571 adv. gam 'also, even'; KJV 'also', ESV 'also', NASB 'also'
H6471 prep. b- + art. + n.fs paʿam 'time, occurrence'; KJV 'at this time', ESV 'this time', NASB 'this time'
H2063 art. + dem. pron. zoʾt 'this'; KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this'
H3808 conj. + neg. particle loʾ 'not'; KJV 'neither would he', ESV 'and did not', NASB 'and he did not'
H7971 Piel perf. 3ms of שָׁלַח 'to send, let go'; KJV 'let go', ESV 'let go', NASB 'let go'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H5971 art. + n.ms ʿam 'people'; KJV 'the people', ESV 'the people', NASB 'the people'
